description:
The Commission of Counter Ghoul, usually abbreviated as CCG, is a federal agency that serves as a criminal investigative body in cases connected to http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghouls]. The CCG`s headquarters are in the 1st Ward. The ghouls commonly call the http://anidb.net/t7112 [ghoul investigators] Doves, a nickname originating from the CCG`s seal.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Ghoul Taisaku Kyoku
